numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that Mali has the lowest percentage.
2. I notice that Indonesia has the highest percentage.
3. The question is: Do you think the world is becoming a better place or a worse place with each generation?
4. I notice that India is a big country.
5. I notice that the US is a big country.
6. I notice that Brazil is a big country.
7. I notice that India does not have a high percentage.
8. I notice that the US does not have a high percentage.
9. I notice that Brazil does not have a high percentage.
10. These percentages are percentages of people who think that the world is becoming a better place with each generation.
11. I wonder why these countries do not have a high percentage.
12. I wonder about the opinions in other countries.
13. I wonder about the percentages in other countries.
14. I wonder about the standard for choosing these countries.
16. My country is not on this list.
17. I have never thought about this question before.
18. I think that all generations can make a better world.
19. The headline is: Can all generations make a better world?
